assigned_vessel_not_found_error: The linked asset could not be found.
add_mobile_terminal_to_polling_zero_item: None of the {selected} selected mobile terminals can be polled.
add_mobile_terminal_to_polling_only_some: Only {pollable} of the {selected} selected mobile terminals can be polled.
table_not_assigned_icon_tooltip: This mobile terminal is not linked to any asset.
add_new_alert_message_on_form_validation: The data in the form is not valid. Please fix the errors and try to save again.
add_new_alert_message_on_channels_missin: There must at least exist one communication channel. Please add one and try to save again.
add_new_alert_message_on_success: The Mobile Terminal has been created successfully.
add_new_alert_message_on_error: The mobile terminal could not be created.
mobile_terminal_already_exists: A mobile terminal with these values already exists.
add_new_alert_message_on_load_transponde: You cannot create a mobile terminal at the moment. Error information: Failed to load terminal systems from the server.
add_new_alert_message_on_load_channel_na: You cannot create a mobile terminal at the moment. Error information: Failed to load channel names from the server.
assign_vessel_message_on_success: The mobile terminal was successfully linked to the asset.
assign_vessel_message_on_error: The mobile terminal could not be linked to the asset.
assign_vessel_message_on_missing_guid_er: Asset is missing guid so linking the mobile terminal to the ssset is not possible.
activate_message_on_success: The mobile terminal was successfully activated.
activate_message_on_error: The mobile terminal could not be activated.
inactivate_message_on_success: The mobile terminal was successfully inactivated.
inactivate_message_on_error: The mobile terminal could not be inactivated.
archive_message_on_success: The mobile terminal was successfully archived.
archive_message_on_error: The mobile terminal could not be archived.
unassign_vessel_message_on_success: The mobile terminal was successfully unlinked from the asset.
unassign_vessel_message_on_error: The mobile terminal could not be unlinked from the asset.
update_alert_message_on_success: The Mobile Terminal has been updated successfully.
update_alert_message_on_error: The Mobile Terminal could not be updated.
update_alert_message_on_assign_error: The mobile terminal has been updated but the linked asset failed to update.
search_zero_results_error: No mobile terminals matching your search criteria was found.
history_alert_message_on_failed_to_load_: Failed to load history for the mobile terminal.
history_alert_message_on_zero_items: No history was found for this terminal.
view_terminal_on_failed_to_load_error: Failed to load the mobile terminal details.
warning_plugin_inactive: The plugin that this terminal uses is inactivated.
